transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello, good morning sir.
Customer: Ha boliye. Sir Shubham bol raha tha sir Shubham bol raha tha India Mart head office se kaise hai sir?
Customer: Ha boliye boliye boliye jaldi boliye.
Executive: Ha sir kuch nahi wo product ka price vagera update kara diya tha to mai aapka complete close kar du baki mujhe jo discuss karna hoga to aap free rahenge tab discuss kar lunga.
Customer: Ha ha karo.
Executive: Thik hai sir mai close kar raha hu aapke pass na ek feedback aayega please aap satisfied feedback dena sir thik hai na. Thik hai abhi abhi abhi sirf ek product me Godrej jo hai na uska update nahi hua wo update ho jayega sir 24 ghante ke andar thik hai baki sare product ka sab kuch update ho chuka hai thik hai?
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Thik hai Godrej fungicide jo Solitan wala uska update nahi hua bas update change ho gaya par update nahi hua wo update ho jayega aapka aaj aaj me thik hai baki sab update ho gaya baki kuch bhi add karna hoga aapke pass number hai mera direct thik hai sir to jab bhi add karna mujhe bata dena unit vagera mai correct kara dunga tumke taraf se aapka thik hai sir?
Customer: Thik hai thik hai. Aur vaise sir free kab hai sir jaise ek baar discuss karna ho online vagera sir free kab hai?
Customer: Pata nahi. Mere ko pata nahi sir mera kaam chalu hai.
Executive: Achha nahi thik hai. Samajh gaya thik hai aap free hoke batana sir mai isko close kar raha hu please satis jo feedback hai usme satisfy jarur dena sir thik hai na.
Customer: Hmm. Achha okay sir. Thank you thank you for time.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to update product price.

- Godrej product update not reflected yet.



Resolution:

- Executive updated product price.

- Executive assured Godrej product will be updated soon.

- Executive provided his direct number for future assistance.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- product update, price, feedback
